model.name: timezone
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW timezones ( countryCode string PRIMARY KEY, countryName varchar(200), zoneName varchar(200), gmtOffset varchar(50), timestamp varchar(50) ) AS SELECT name, alpha2_code,alpha3_code FROM (EXEC ws.invokeHttp(action=>'GET', endpoint=>'/v2/list-time-zone?key=Q0B8OGIPT4H4&format=json', stream=>'TRUE')) AS f, XMLTABLE('/root/RestResponse/result' PASSING JSONTOXML('root', f.result) COLUMNS countryCode string PATH 'countryCode/text()', countryName string PATH 'countryName/text()', zoneName string PATH 'zoneName/text()', gmtOffset string PATH 'gmtOffset/text()', timestamp string PATH 'timestamp/text()') AS A;
